title: Cosmovitral Botanical Garden
description: A stunning glass-enclosed botanical garden famous for its colorful stained glass murals and diverse plant species. A cultural and artistic icon of Toluca.

title: Nevado de Toluca
description: An impressive volcanic peak and natural park offering hiking, stunning crater lakes, and panoramic views. A must-visit for nature lovers and adventure seekers.

title: Museo de la Acuarela
description: A museum dedicated to watercolor art, featuring both contemporary and classic exhibitions. Visitors can enjoy the artistic heritage of Toluca in a charming and cultural setting.
